short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you quickly to set the X-Forwarded-For HTTP Header

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly update the X-Forwarded-For, X-Originating-IP, X-Remote-IP, X-Remote-Addr, and many other HTTP headers for various testing purpose. You can create different profiles for different domains, headers, and IP values.
